title: Safety with small craft
creator_credit: Southern Films and Eric L. Morris
brief_description: Outlines commonsense safety rules to be followed on rivers, lakes and the sea by water skiers, fishermen, skin-divers, and yachtsmen. Rules regarding life-jackets, giving way, speed limits, and fuelling procedures are illustrated. Suggests simple precautions to be taken by power boat owners to ensure safety.
